snippet: Mr. Rubio has been more open about his religious background, but with a major donor who is a supporter of same-sex marriage, some faith-driven voters have been left wondering.
abstract: Sen Marco Rubio has struggled to make inroads with evangelical conservatives in Iowa and across nation, in part because his religious background is bit of mystery; Rubio has begun emphasizing role religion has played in his life on campaign trail, but his struggles underscores difficulty he faces as he tries to construct coalition of both religious conservatives and powerful establishment figures.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Rubio has been more open about his religious background, but with a major donor who is a supporter of same-sex marriage, some faith-driven voters have been left wondering.

headline.main: As Marco Rubio Speaks of Faith, Evangelicals Keep Options Open
headline.print_headline: As Rubio Speaks More of His Faith, Evangelicals Keep Their Options Open

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
